name: T20 WorldCup Cricket Game
description:
*** T20 Cricket WorldCup Challenge ***

How much do you love cricket and cricket stars?

If you accept the challenge, Game will bring 10 matches to you

*WarmUp Match
*Qualifying Match
*1st Match
*2nd Match
*3rd Match
*4th Match
*Super Eight
*Quarter Final
*Semi Final
*Final Match

You have to score your best in every match to qualify for next match.

Compete players from all over the world, win your place in *** Hall of Fame *** and share your success with Facebook friends.

If you stuck somewhere in any match, you can use social life line and ask your Twitter or Facebook friends for help.
